intro: The pivot joint allows for rotation or turning movement.
notes: Atlas (C1): The first bone that supports the skull.
Axis (C2): The second bone with a peg for rotation.
Allows the head to turn side-to-side ('No' movement).

hotspots.label: Atlas C1
hotspots.info: Supports the skull and allows nodding.

hotspots.label: Axis C2
hotspots.info: Contains the 'peg' that the Atlas turns on.

hotspots.label: Skull Base
hotspots.info: The Occipital bone resting on the Atlas.
